name: U.S. adults' belief on top three barriers to students accessing strong STEM education in the United States: 2021
description: U.S. adults' belief on top three barriers to students accessing strong STEM education in the United States: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Responses are to the following: What do you believe are the top barriers, if any, standing in the way of students currently accessing a strong STEM education within your country? Select top three.
sources: 3M. 2022. 2022 State of Science Index. Conducted 27 September–17 December 2021.Science and Engineering Indicators
